description:
Join the millions of users worldwide who use the award winning app ChatTime to make cheap international, long distance or local phone calls. ChatTime connects you to talk to your friends and family wherever they are, even if they are not online or using ChatTime. Free credits for Free calls!

Unlike Skype™ or Viber™, ChatTime gives you the option to place your calls over a local access number or over the internet. You can place a phone call on the move to anyone anywhere in the world with crystal clear call quality.

LOW COST CHEAP CALLS TO LANDLINES & MOBILES
Talk longer with up to 98% savings compared to Skype™ or Viber™. 
Cheap calling rates from 1c/min, much cheaper than your mobile operator: 
● India at 1¢/min with 3 options for monthly plans!
● Mexico Mobile at 11.9¢/min - Talk up to 2 times longer! 
● Thailand from 3.9¢/min - Talk up to 2 times longer! 
● USA & UK from 1.9¢/min, 20% cheaper! 
● Philippines Mobile at 19.9¢/min, 25% cheaper! 
● Cheapest International Calling ~ 1¢/min with monthly call plans.

CUSTOMER REVIEWS
****Why Millions All Over The World Have Downloaded ChatTime****
1. ◆◆◆◆◆ "[Wonderful] - I am saving a fortune with this app"
2. ◆◆◆◆◆ "[Excellent] - EXCELLENT way to directly call internationally….sound quality is excellent….ITS THE BEST!"
3. ◆◆◆◆◆ "[Great app!!!! Super affordable] - Super affordable, easy to use, great customer service."
4. ◆◆◆◆◆ "[Good app] - This app has kept me close to my family, thank you!"


CRYSTAL CLEAR PHONE CALLS
●  Reliable and consistent call quality
●  Call any landline and mobile in the world
●  Even use while traveling (roaming)
●  Save on your cellular data usage

CALL ANYONE ON THE GO, ANYWHERE 
●  Talk to your friends anytime, on the go
●  No contacts to import
●  No complicated prefixes to enter
●  Bluetooth support

STAY SECURE & CONNECTED
●  No more phone calling cards, internet browsers
●  Securely manage your account within ChatTime  
●  Access call and purchase history from your phone
●  24 Hour Support

OTHER FEATURES
●  Favorites Speed Dial
●  Show/Hide Caller ID
●  Callback or Direct Call
●  Display local time at calling destination

FREE CALLS USING FREE CREDITS
●  Create a free account
●  Get to earn free call credits for your calls 

ChatTime gives you all the tools you need to call and save! International and local calls just like any regular phone call, connected through our local call access number using your wireless/mobile minutes or over your internet using Wi-Fi or 3G/LTE.

▪▪▪What Others Are Saying about ChatTime▪▪▪ 

"If you make international calls, there really isn’t any reason not to make ChatTime your go to app for calling." smokinapps.com 16-May

"ChatTime seems to offer a good budget-minded alternative to international Skyping." TUAW 14-Oct 

A Red Herring Global Winner 
A Red Herring Asia Winner 
Mobile Village Online 2nd Place Consumer App: VoiceCalling Category 

***IMPORTANT***

1. Operator local charges may apply for the local part of the call to our local access number. 

2. To avoid excess local operator charges:
• Simply add our local access number to your Friends & Family Plan or any Frequently Called Number Plan with your carrier; or
• Use ChatTime Internet calling

3. Make very cheap international calls to these countries: Afghanistan, Argentina, Australia, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Brazil, Cambodia, Canada, Chile, China, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dominican Republic, Egypt, El Salvador, France, Germany, Ghana, Greece, Guatemala, Honduras, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Iran, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Korea, Kuwait, Mexico, Myanmar, Nepal, Netherlands, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Nigeria, Norway, Oman, Pakistan, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Thailand, Taiwan, Turkey, UAE, UK, USA, Venezuela, Vietnam
trackCensoredName: ChatTime: Cheap International Calling, Free Phone Calls
trackName: ChatTime: Cheap International Calling, Free Phone Calls
releaseNotes:
* Ability to place calls over the internet (wifi or 3g/LTE), amazing call quality !!!
* Now supports local calls and calls while traveling internationally (roaming)
* ChatTime brings all the boys to the yard!!!
* iOS8 support
* General bug fixes
